pkgmetadata.longdescription: Modeling of Ordinal Random Variables via Softmax Regression // Supports the modeling of ordinal random variables, like the outcomes of races, via Softmax regression, under the Harville doi:10.1080/01621459.1973.10482425 and Henery doi:10.1111/j.2517-6161.1981.tb01153.x models.
